message: Welcome to our store! I hope you find our selection appealing. Our products are carefully curated to ensure quality, though it's important to note that there's a 50% chance of receiving a high-quality item. This particular item has been identified as low-quality, but we strive to maintain transparency and fairness in all our transactions. Given the final and non-refundable nature of the purchase, please consider this information thoughtfully before making your decision.
